comment.author: 63051299@N00
comment._content:
This whole set is really great; I wanted to leave a comment on almost every image but I think that putting a 'wow' under 100 images is a tad ridiculous so I'm keeping it to this one.

It's awesome enough visiting these sites today - I cant even imagine what a sight like this would've felt like a hundred years ago.

Just wow.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Thanks for your comments on both flicks!  It really is amazing how different these places look now.  I was with one of our Egyptian curators reviewing some of these images the other day and he was talking about what had been excavated, how walls had been reconstructed in some areas, etc.  Pretty fascinating.  -shelley, manager of information systems, brooklyn museum
